    • Method Detail

      • learningIteration

        public void learningIteration(double reward,
                              double[] nextState,
                              double discountFactor,
                              double ratio)
        Updates neurons weights using reward and nextState with Q-learning algorithm. Discount factor is raised to the power of QAgent.iteration. To off learning discounting, set discount factor at 1
        Specified by:
        learningIteration in interface QAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        reward - agent reward for previous result
        nextState - next environment state
        discountFactor - decrease in learning rate at each iteration. Usually between 0 and 1
        ratio - fixed value of learning step reducing. Usually between 0 and 1
        Since:
        1.1
